name: Aman Verma

experience.title: Sales & Marketing
experience.description: Symbiosis is a hotel travelling process where we had a different types of hotels around the world and we searched that hotels on google and find their hotel's address, their nearby airports, bus stations, train stations their email id, telephone no. etc all this data's and information we record in our data and then we prepare a bill for the customers. It was a great experience for me to working in this organization.

It was a great experience for me to working in this organization. <!---->

recommendations: Hitesh Bakshi “Aman Verma is one the most dedicated and humble people I have come across in my managing career. It was really a blessing to have Aman in the team. No matter what time it is, you can count on Aman. I'd live to work with him in any team. Great team m-player, great ethic towards work and the team. I'd recommend him to any team and organization. Cheers!”
